Classes in org.semanticweb.kaon2.api used by org.semanticweb.kaon2.api
Axiom
          Represents an axiom in the ontology.
Cursor
          This interface enables sequential access to a result set of a search.
DefaultOntologyResolver
          This is the default resolver that maintains a list of associations for ontology URIs.
Entity
          Represents a entity in a DL ontology.
KAON2Exception
          The exception thrown by various KAON2 API methods.
KAON2Factory
          The factory for KAON2 objects.
KAON2Factory.AxiomIterator
          An interface for iterating over axioms.
KAON2Visitor
          A visitor for the KAON2 objects.
Namespaces
          This interface contains some well-known namespaces.
Ontology
          Represents a DL ontology.
OntologyChangeEvent
          The information about a change in the ontology.
OntologyChangeEvent.ChangeType
          The type of change.
OntologyListener
          A listener for events on an ontology.
OntologyManager
          The connection to the KAON2.
OntologyResolver
          The resolver for ontology parameters.
ProgressListener
          This interface receives information about the progress of various processes in KAON2.
Request
          This interface encapsulates the request for a retrieval of a set of objects from the KAON2 API.
